title: How to Get Paid Through PayPal

steps.title: Open the "PayPal" app.
steps.content: Open the "PayPal" app. If you aren't already logged in, do so with your PayPal email address and password.

steps.title: Tap Access Contacts.
steps.content: Tap Access Contacts . You may have to authorize PayPal by tapping OK to do this.

steps.title: Type in a name, email address, or phone number.
steps.content: Type in a name, email address, or phone number. You can also tap a contact's name.

steps.title: Tap Request Now.
steps.content: Tap Request Now . You can also add a note from here if you please.

steps.title: Wait for your recipient to pay you.
steps.content: Wait for your recipient to pay you. You have successfully requested money through PayPal!

steps.title: Open the PayPal website.
steps.content: Open the PayPal website . If you haven't done so already, log into PayPal with your user email address and password.

steps.title: Click Send & Request.
steps.content: Click Send & Request . This is at the top of the PayPal page.

steps.title: Click Grab Your Link Now.
steps.content: Click Grab Your Link Now . You'll find this under the "Get paid back" heading at the bottom of the page. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Type in your preferred link name.
steps.content: Type in your preferred link name.

steps.title: Customize your PayPal profile.
steps.content: Customize your PayPal profile. You can add the following to your link: A picture A custom color palette Differentiation between "Friends & family" and "Goods & services"

steps.title: Send your PayPal link to a contact.
steps.content: Send your PayPal link to a contact. You can do this in whichever medium you prefer--email, text message, instant message, and so on.

steps.title: Wait for your contact to pay you.
steps.content: Wait for your contact to pay you. Now you know how to get paid through PayPal!
